Name: My Strong Horse
About the game: Sym4D, Vive equipment required. Become a knight on a medieval horse, and defeat 5 enemy captains to win. For example, combat methods and special features of the game How to move Go forward-shake both controls up and down in front Stopping-Bring both controls up to the side of your head Battle method Rotate-one control up to the side of the head Attack-Press the left trigger button (move control is not possible if left trigger button is pressed) In the article, the red mark is on the top and is the captain. Defeat 5 captains. Since this game is free, it cannot be maintained on the network. If the network doesn't work, don't use it. Steam supporters say they can't connect to the network, so I don't think they can connect to foreign countries. Corea has a good network. This is a game made by 3 people for 2 weeks, and they are currently working on different projects. Please pray for a better game in the future.
